argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_acosval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arccos ` A ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arccos ` A ) ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_picn | |- _pi e. CC |
| 4 |  | #P_halfcl | |- ( _pi e. CC -> ( _pi / 2 ) e. CC ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( _pi / 2 ) e. CC |
| 6 |  | #P_asincl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arcsin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_nncan | |- ( ( ( _pi / 2 ) e. CC /\ ( arcsin ` A ) e. CC ) -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) = ( arcsin ` A ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) = ( arcsin ` A ) ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arccos ` A ) ) = ( arcsin ` A ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arccos ` A ) ) ) = ( cos ` ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_acoscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arccos ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_coshalfpim | |- ( ( arccos ` A ) e. CC -> ( cos ` ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arccos ` A ) ) ) = ( sin ` ( arccos ` A ) ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arccos ` A ) ) ) = ( sin ` ( arccos ` A ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_cosasin | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` ( arcsin ` A ) ) = ( sqrt ` ( 1 - ( A ^ 2 ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 13, 14 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` ( arccos ` A ) ) = ( sqrt ` ( 1 - ( A ^ 2 ) ) ) ) |
